case: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
quoteText: For purposes of California law, we may share with these parties all categories of personal information, except for background and criminal information, biometric information, and government identifiers.

case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
quoteText: We use our own and third-party technologies such as cookies, web beacons, and mobile device identifiers to collect information about the use of our websites and mobile services.

quoteText: web beacons allow us to know if a certain page was visited, an email was opened

case: This service tracks you on other websites
quoteText: We also receive information, such as device information and browsing information, from third parties for marketing purposes, for example to provide you with personalized ads on Walmart and third-party websites and mobile services.

case: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
quoteText: We use your personal information to provide you products and services, such as to fulfill your requests for products or to help us personalize our services and marketing to you. We also use your personal information to support our business functions, such as fraud prevention, marketing, and legal functions.

case: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

quoteText: and third-party advertising

case: Your profile is combined across various products
quoteText: To do the above, we combine information, collected online and offline, including information from third party sources.

case: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
quoteText: We share personal information about you with service providers that help with our business activities, including shipping vendors, billing and refund vendors, payment card processors, marketing and advertising vendors, and companies that help us improve our products and services.

case: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
quoteText: We share personal information about you with service providers that help with our business activities, including shipping vendors, billing and refund vendors, payment card processors, marketing and advertising vendors, and companies that help us improve our products and services.

case: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
quoteText:
We require our service providers to keep your personal information secure.
We do not allow our service providers to use or share your personal information for any purpose other than providing services on our behalf.
